attributes.action: Stop all business's advertising any Christmas related item/s before December 1st
attributes.background: I am genuine lover of Christmas and all of it's activities, but it seems that because of societies incessant need to have everything now, we are spoiling what makes Christmas special. Advertising seems to begin as early as late October, and I want a blanket Ban on all advertising until December 1st.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of shops and other businesses.
